MAN.TITLE: isreal
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: check if a variable as real or complex entries

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : vector or matrix with floating point entries or coefficients

DESCRIPTION.P: isreal(x) returns true if x is stored as a real variable and false if x is stored with an (eventually zero) imaginary part.
isreal(x,eps) returns true if x is stored as a real variable or if maximum absolute value of imaginary floating points if less or equal than eps.
